Release Notes for STM32WLxx Sigfox Middleware

Sigfox specific license is also applicable at: Sigfox License

Purpose

This Middlewares provides the Sigfox Middleware for the stm32wlxx products. This covers

  • STM32WLxx devices

This driver is composed of 4 directories:

  • Crypto

  • Monarch

  • SigfoxLib

  • SigfoxLibTest

Update History

Main Changes

fix: Sigfox_KMS: CubeIDE not placing keys in same order than other IDEs

fix: keil warning removal + cubeide keys solution simplification

feature: update to SFX_LIB_V2.10.0_SE_FDL_MON

Version of embedded Sigfox libraries:

  • Crypto : V1.0.0
  • Monarch: V2.0.1 (STMicroelectronics Patent) => NEW
  • SigfoxLib: V2.10.0 => NEW
  • SigfoxLibTest: V0.8.0 => NEW

Main Changes

Multiple tools write to the same file’ if AES + Sigfox + option .c/.h
